law.catch_line: A person who willfully misrepresents the amount of consideration paid in a transaction by affixing t...
law.text: A person who willfully misrepresents the amount of consideration paid in a transaction by affixing to an instrument of writing evidence of a greater or lesser recordation tax paid than required under Title 12 of this article is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months.
